Title: Falling
Plot: The detectives investigate the mystery of a falling construction crane in the city and that leads them to something much more sinister.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb.
GuestStars: Ruby Jerins (Lacey Talbot), Michael Kelly (Gary Talbot), Ed Moran (Carl Nolan), Geraldine Hughes (Sandra Talbot), Frank Converse (Wayne Hardy), Greg McFadden (Dr. Connor Dunning)
